Description:
A General detection for WebDav user-agent being used to PUT files on a WebDav network share. This could be an indicator of exfiltration.

Author: Roberto Rodriguez (Cyb3rWard0g), OTR (Open Threat Research)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: WebDav Put Request
Query: sourcetype='zeek-http' eql select * from _source_ where ((user_agent like '%webdav%' and method = 'put') and  not (id.resp_h cidr '10.0.0.0/8' or id.resp_h cidr '127.0.0.0/8' or id.resp_h cidr '172.16.0.0/12' or id.resp_h cidr '192.168.0.0/16' or id.resp_h cidr '169.254.0.0/16'))
